chunk:
LUVANTI O2 Revitalizing Age-Defense Cream (2018 formulation)

Brand: LUVANTI

Category: Anti Aging

Ingredients: Aqua purified water, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, persea gratissima (avocado) oil, stearic acid, octyl dodecanol, glyceryl stearate, cetyl alcohol, C12-C15 alkyl benzoate, butyrospermum parkii shea butter, glycerin, hydrolyzed RNA, hydrolyzed DNA, buxus chinensis jojoba oil, fucus vesiculosus bladderwrack extract,

stearate, cetyl alcohol, C12-C15 alkyl benzoate, butyrospermum parkii shea butter, glycerin, hydrolyzed RNA, hydrolyzed DNA, buxus chinensis jojoba oil, fucus vesiculosus bladderwrack extract, ubiquinone co enzyme Q10, sodium hyaluronate, soy lecithin, sodium ascorbyl phosphate, hippophae rhamnoides seabuckthorn oil, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl

oil, fucus vesiculosus bladderwrack extract, ubiquinone co enzyme Q10, sodium hyaluronate, soy lecithin, sodium ascorbyl phosphate, hippophae rhamnoides seabuckthorn oil, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, sorbic acid, calendula officinalis calendula flower extract, camellia sinensis green tea leaf extract, vaccinium corymbosum blueberry seed oil,

seabuckthorn oil, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, sorbic acid, calendula officinalis calendula flower extract, camellia sinensis green tea leaf extract, vaccinium corymbosum blueberry seed oil, CI 77491, CI 77492, beta carotene

Directions: After cleansing and toning, apply a small amount to moist skin and massage in gently. Rub between palms before applying for best results.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer
